metadata.title: CVE-2024-35881 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Revert "drm/amd/display: Send DTBCLK disable message on first commit"This reverts commit f341055b10bd8be55c3c995dff5f770b236b8ca9.System hang observed, this commit is thought to be theregression point.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
